BlogPage.articleOneText1: According to numerous recruiting agencies, knowing foreign languages can result in a 10-15% increase in salary. The ability to communicate in another language may be a crucial factor in your job or a job you would like to try. At the very least, this knowledge adds to your flexibility.
BlogPage.articleOneTitle2: Building bridges with clients and colleagues from different cultures.
BlogPage.articleOneText2: Spending some time learning a language may yield unique experiences and rewards. Sharing common ground with colleagues or clients will improve your relationships.
BlogPage.articleOneText3: Adaptations are hard and a lot of content has failed to make the same impression in every language due to tricky wordplay or unique accents. Enjoy authenticity!
BlogPage.articleOneText4: The best way to dive into an interesting topic is carefully prepared content. Picking your own way of learning makes it far more interesting. Maybe start with a hobby of yours. Just try to find any material related to your hobbies in a foreign language. You will see how drastically different the learning process will become.
BlogPage.articleOneText5: Knowing Language will give you opportunities beyond your usual scope. New experiences are waiting!
BlogPage.articleOneText6: If you have ever wanted to taste the other life outside your hometown, join an exotic culture, meet new amazing friends; you are free to so if you know the language.
BlogPage.articleTwoText1: Being forced to stay home doesn’t stop motivated people from being productive. There are many ways to develop new skills online, but we figured that most people don’t know where to start. Our recommendation would be, to find the inner motivation that’s going to drive you through these times. You can find a lot of professionals talking about their fields in-depth and with passion on TED.
BlogPage.articleTwoText2: Though the TED community is very international, the majority of speakers are presenting in English. For those who learn English, we made a Player. Video flow controls will allow for easy understanding and selecting unknown words will give you access to functions of Extension. The Extension will allow you to translate words in text and add to a digital cloud for later revision through fun games.
BlogPage.articleThreeTitleMain: Free English learning apps: what to expect before you sign up.
BlogPage.articleThreeText1:
Apps for learning languages promise to teach you how to use a new language just with a computer or phone. They’re similar in concept: daily exercises to teach you an entire language.

It’s promising, especially if you’re not already immersed in a language environment that will give you the exposure you need to pick up a second language. The question is, are they effective?

I’m sure you are aware that a language is a complex interconnected system of components that build a way to communicate. I’m talking about morphology, syntax, semantics and other language goddesses.

Let’s face it.

Apps help to stay motivated! We live a busy life and we either before or after work. We get a notification and go to the app then choose the simplest way: do exercises on what we know by heart and get our bonuses to feel like ‘mission accomplished’. Do you get it? It's an illusion of progress.

You can learn how to pronounce sounds and phonemes - but there are plenty of exceptions when the same letter combination is pronounced differently in different words. After three(!) years of living in the UK I was able to correctly pronounce vowel sounds without my decent russian accent.

You can learn a basic set of English words - you will successfully do your exercises by clicking on the correct answers. Does this have to do with understanding words in a real situation? In real life we ​​come across a huge number of phrases in a varied context that changes their meaning and connotation. That’s confusing and curious.

You can learn grammar - but will it teach you to use language? Let’s say you are in the middle of conversation and trying to recall the grammar rule of 2 conditionals, then trying to apply to your case and finally saying that, most likely with an error. It takes about 30 seconds or more. A person you are talking to will wait once or twice, if he is British - probably about 5 times, but the situation can hardly be called ‘easy communication’ and most likely the person will start to avoid you.

The last question: Is it possible to learn how to maintain professional dialogues, for example about banking rules, software architecture or astrophysics? It is difficult if your vocab has just a basic set of words like “good”, “nice to meet you”, “how much does it cost”.
BlogPage.articleThreeText2: Using popular language learning applications is the starting point and certainly not the end. If you have completed all levels or got all strikes - it’s time to find options for immersion in the real language: find a live teacher, native speaker or at least start a smooth immersion in real English with eLang.

AboutUs.text1: eLang - это команда из 10 человек, вдохновленных идеей изучения языков, с опытом проживания в 7 странах мира и свободно говорящих на 6 языках. Наш основатель, Сергей Федоренко, развивал идею eLang порядка 10 лет и в ноябре 2019 запустил разработку в Минске.
AboutUs.text2: Мы видим основную проблему при изучении языка в мотивации. Ее может хватить, чтобы начать изучение, но в процессе мы неизбежно ее теряем. eLang за обучение без скучных правил, заучивание ненужных слов и долгого поиска по словарям.
AboutUs.text2.1: Наше решение - искать мотивацию для изучения языка в интересах самого ученика: спортивные автомобили, кулинария, спорт, видеоигры, косметика и не ограничивать его в этом выборе.
AboutUs.text3: Мы сделали сервис который делает поиск по видео на любимых платформах YouTube и TED и с возможностью доступа к видео файлам с компьютера.
AboutUs.text3.1.list:
• одновременном показе двойных субтитров
  • удобной навигации по видео (управление по субтитрам)
  • замедленном повторе фраз - у нас это быстро и просто
  • встроенном переводе субтитров (фраз, слов, части слов)
  • ведении своего словаря
  • повторе слов в уникальных играх со ссылкой на контекст использования

ExtensionPage.GetStartedText:
Learn Languages and translate words
in Web Browser
ExtensionPage.GetStartedBottomText:
• Translate word and phrases within sentences
  • Revise words in context (that you have read it in)
  • Revise via games (available on mobile)
  • Expand your vocabulary
ExtensionPage.1-SlideExtensionBody: Every single article may become a worthy learning material to strengthen your knowledge of foreign language. What’s more important is that you enjoy such content.
ExtensionPage.2-SlideExtensionBody: You may choose to translate a singular word, few words, or an entire sentence. Besides, we can quickly send the selected part for translation.
ExtensionPage.3-SlideExtensionBody: You may keep the translation window open, we got hold on it the entire time.
ExtensionPage.4-SlideExtensionBody: If you select “Save to Tutor” option, we will save it for comfortable learning.
ExtensionPage.5-SlideExtensionHeader:
In one place the whole
history of learning
ExtensionPage.5-SlideExtensionBody: You read a lot, but only some pages will be used to study foreign language.
ExtensionPage.6-SlideExtensionHeader:
Repeat words
right in an article
ExtensionPage.6-SlideExtensionBody: You will have the option to go back to the pages that interested you, where we will conceal selected by you words for maximum effect. You may choose to reveal them if you want to.
ExtensionPage.7-SlideExtensionBody: Your Tutor history  will be a source for various games to repeat the words you selected.
ExtensionPage.8-SlideExtensionBody: Your personal lessons will be divided into categories based on material you learned or the day you have selected them.
ExtensionPage.9-SlideExtensionBody: For fast transition from PC to mobile, scan the QR code available under the “Open on mobile tab”.
ExtensionPage.10-SlideExtensionHeader:
And be mobile!
Don't waste your time!
ExtensionPage.10-SlideExtensionBody: Now you can revise material anywhere, with games we created for you it will be way more fun!

ExtensionInstructionPage.1-InstructionParagraph-a: Теперь Вы можете переводить слова и словосочетания в контексте
ExtensionInstructionPage.2-InstructionParagraph-a: Улучшайте Ваши языковые навыки вместе с EasyLang
ExtensionInstructionPage.4-InstructionCardParagraph-a: Слова и выражения будут по умолчанию</br>переведены на Ваш родной язык
ExtensionInstructionPage.2-InstructionCardHeading-a: Не переводить страницы на родном языке:
ExtensionInstructionPage.5-InstructionCardParagraph-a: По умолчанию функции перевода отключены,</br>если язык страницы совпадает с Вашим родным</br> языком. Вы можете активировать перевод для</br> таких страниц в Настройках.
ExtensionInstructionPage.3-InstructionCardParagraph-b: Играй в игры и повторяй новые слова

PlayerPage.ScrolledContentPlayerHeader:
One more powerful tool
for learning language
PlayerPage.PlayerHeader:
Watch videos subtitle by subtitle
to practice your audition
PlayerPage.PlayerTopText:
Watch videos you like
Add subtitles in any languages
Don’t miss a phrase
PlayerPage.1-SlidePlayerHeader:
You may set
two subtitles at once
PlayerPage.1-SlidePlayerBody: Our programm supports *.mkv type files which can contain multiple syncronized subtitles. These files may also contain multiple audio components to complete experience.
PlayerPage.2-SlidePlayerBody: Interpretive translation is a more accurate translation of phrases that have undermeaning to them. It will help you understand common slang and word play in the scene.
PlayerPage.3-SlidePlayerBody: We hid some parts of translation so you can try yourself first. You will be able to check results by pressing eye icon.
PlayerPage.4-SlidePlayerBody: Sometimes word play will be confusing, so it's important to have Google Translate with you. While, our program will maximize comfort when during the use by allowing you to select any part of the text.
PlayerPage.5-SlidePlayerBody: We are strictly controlling video scroll so you don't have to mouse drag.
PlayerPage.6-SlidePlayerBody: It's easy to listen multiple times to the same video fragment with a simple click. This will help you develop your listening skills.
PlayerPage.7-SlidePlayerBody: You can choose any sentence, phrase or word and add them to your lessons for later.
PlayerPage.8-SlidePlayerBody: List on the side will help you navigate through the movie. You will also be able to see what you added to your lessons.
PlayerPage.9-SlidePlayerHeader:
To repeat words
just scan QR code
and go to games
PlayerPage.9-SlidePlayerBody: In order to play scan the QR code.
PlayerPage.10-SlidePlayerBody: Everything is in your usual browser. Now you can revise material anywhere, with games we created for you it will be way more fun!
PlayerPage.GetStartedBottomText:
• Translate word and phrases within sentences
  • Revise words in context (that you have read it in)
  • Revise via games (available on mobile)
  • Expand your vocabulary

A good language learning app
with easy navigation.
Landing.AnnReview:
A great app for learning English without cramming.
You can enjoy videos of your favorite foreign bloggers without torment with a translator.
It’s so convenient to navigate in subtitles by choosing the language and a screen position.
Landing.TimReview:
I have been thinking about combining all these functions for a long time and when I met,
I was pleasantly surprised not only by the functions but also by the convenient, intuitive interface.
